The Bone Snatcher is about a group miners who go on a search for a missing crew of miners in the Namib Desert. When the find them, the love of life and love lost. Enjoy moment feeding the desire of a lost love and capturing the moment in a group of loving people and possible living to tell of the long lost love. This is a very well written story with love, loss, and love to be had. Nothing sand pails love lost love.

What is left of Planet Earth is populated by a few poor and starving rag-tag survivors. They must eat bugs and insects, or whatever they can find.
